ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Saturday Morning Adventures - April Special
ComicInfo.Summary:
What better month to have a special dedicated to the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles' favorite journalist in a jumpsuit? Shredder's been stranded after his plan to acquire a new Technodrome backfired on him, but April still finds herself in a serious situation with the heroes in a half-shell nowhere in sight! Luckily, April doesn't have to adventure alone, as Ace Duck makes his debut, seeking hidden treasure in the Lost Temple of Avila! This adventure will be newsworthy and that's no April fooling! Also, because you demanded it, this 40-page issue features the return of another very special mutant: Mona Lisa!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-05 03:24:37. [CVDB1050639]
